sentence: Donald Trump has cut his first ad for Georgia GOP gubernatorial candidate David Perdue, and it's everything Democrats could hope for: a rehash of Trump's 2020 grievances squarely targeted at incumbent Republican governor Brian Kemp all while exhibiting impeccably bad taste.
title: Trump's endorsement ad of David Perdue is perfectly divisive and comically awful

title: Exclusive-Trump Weighs How Deeply To Dig Into His War Chest For November Elections

sentence: "While Brian Kemp and David Perdue bicker, display the raw bitterness of their Trump-owned party's internal war and fight each other, @staceyabrams is fighting for Georgians," Lauren Groh-Wargo, Abrams' campaign manager, tweeted in response to the debate.

title: David Perdue Opens Georgia Primary Debate by Declaring Election Was Stolen

sentence: Lindenbaum's name appears as the third signature on the original complaint in the lawsuit alleging voter suppression in the race that saw then-Republican Secretary of State Brian Kemp defeat Abrams by 55,000 votes statewide in the governor's race.
title: Biden FEC pick claimed Georgia voting machines 'switched' votes from Abrams to Kemp in 2018
